crypto.name: Copper Crypto
crypto.desc: I've been learning the new pycryptodome library! I don't know much yet though. Here's my first code to encrypt some text:

crypto.name: Jank File Encryptor
crypto.desc: They say you shouldn't roll your own encryption code, but I think all those naysayers are just gatekeeping!

misc.name: Lost Some Magic
misc.desc: I had a flag but I can no longer open it up. I think I compressed it beforehand but I can't remember how many times! And I may have lost some magic along the way....

misc.name: More than meets the eye
misc.desc:
I found this method to transform an image into a bunch of numbers to hide important data. I bet you can't undo my method.

I'll even give you a hint, you may want to look into the work done by Carl Friedrich Gauss when calculating orbits.

misc.name: The Time Equations
misc.desc: I have found the secrets of time travel hidden in 5 linear equations! HOWEVER, they need to be solved within 10 seconds or else the quantumn state of the universe changes and the original equations are no longer valid! Can you do it?

osint.name: Aerial Attack
osint.desc:
Find where this photo was taken! Make sure to keep your eyes out for the hawks though!

The flag is the truncated coordinate of this location to the hundredths. Ex: (xx.xx, xx.xx)

osint.name: Hidden Snack Stop

pwn.name: Beginner Pwn 1
pwn.desc: Pwn can be a pretty intimidating catagory to get started in. So we made a few chals to help new comers get their feet wet!

pwn.name: Beginner Pwn 2
pwn.desc: I wrote a program to take your name and say hello!

pwn.name: Guess It
pwn.desc: Why don't you try guessing the flag? I don't know of any other way of finding the canary...

pwn.name: Reptilian Server
pwn.desc:
You are a human spy sent to gather information on a new centralized computing station that the Reptilians have developed, and is being used to house important secrets. In order to blend in, you learned the Reptilian language, which is similar to English except there are no spaces and you can't talk for too long.

Using your unique skillset, gather as much information from the Reptilians as you can. If you can tell us how they started the server we can replicate it ourselves. There may be a flag in it for you if you do.

The flag will be in the standard format for SwampCTF.

pwn.name: Scratchpad
pwn.desc: I often find myself losing track of my notes, so why don't I setup a public-facing note keeping service?

pwn.name: where2go
pwn.desc: I got this binary and I don't even know what it does!

rev.name: ARMory
rev.desc: This new phone from UFSIT is running, SwampOS, which is highly secure version of AOSP. Running with full disk encryption by default, figure out the password to unlock the phone.

rev.name: Beginner Rev
rev.desc: To all the new CTFers who are starting to dip their toes in the wonderful world of cybersecurity, we wish you all the best in your CTF journey!

rev.name: McGuffin Hunt
rev.desc: Sometimes an object as simple as a fence can slow the main character of a story down, but notices how I didn't say stop....

rev.name: Off The Hook
rev.desc: We did some dabbling with apk's, have fun!

rev.name: stallmanCrypt
rev.desc: Richard Stallman has finally gone off the deep end! He hacked Microsoft and deleted all copies of the Windows 11 source code except for one, but it's encrypted! Can you save it?

web.name: Potion Seller
web.desc: My potions would kill you, traveler. You cannot handle my potions.
